FuncDef: This command configures the announce message interval used for both unicast and multicast messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the announce packet interval, in log form. Values--3 to 4.

ExtraInfo: Default: log-anno-interval 1 (1 packet every 2 seconds) for ieee1588-2008log-anno-interval 1 (1 packet every 2 seconds) for g8265dot1-2010log-anno-interval -3 (8 packets per second) for g8275dot1-2014
